price: Nokorε sε, Yɛasͻ (Makafoͻ no) ahwε sεdeε Yεsͻͻ Afuo wurafoͻ no hwεeε no, εberε a wͻkaa ntam sε, wͻbεte afuo no mu nnͻbae no anͻpa tutuutu no.
arabic: إِنَّا بَلَوۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ إِذۡ أَقۡسَمُواْ لَيَصۡرِمُنَّهَا مُصۡبِحِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā balawnāhum kamā balawnā aṣḥāba al-janati idh aqsamū layaṣrimunnahā muṣ'biḥīna
